name: Home Access Center - Dark Material Design
description:
This is a theme for Home Access Center version 3 by eSchoolPLUS. It is pre-configured to work with Fulton County Schools' HAC website.

THIS THEME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. NOT ALL FEATURES ARE COMPLETE.

Features:
- dark theme
- material design
- blue accent color
- smaller header
- no footer
additional_info:
v3.0.1
- new FCS HAC url
v3.0
- login screen redesigned to follow material design guidlines
- login screen uses Roboto font
- behind-the-scenes work to allow for custom colors in the future
- behind-the-scenes work to allow for easier design changes in the future
v2.2.3
- changed course dropped message from red to yellow to increase contrast
- themed account drop down
- visual feedback in now provided when clicking tabs in the header
- fixed login page when being required to sign in again after extended inactivity
v2.1
- fixed font not displaying properly
- added styles for student support tab success plan
- started work on registration tab

v2.0
- added styles for header on all pages
- added styles for home page
- added styles for classwork page
- added styles for schedule page
- removed footer

v1.0.1
- fixed spacing above button
- fixed spacing between username input field and password title

v1.0
- initial release
